BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.

articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.
articles.title: Dogecoin Millionaire Explains How Neiro United Meme Coins

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market has been a rollercoaster in 2024, but amidst the volatility, Sui (SUI) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are emerging as top gainers. Both projects have caught the attention of Ethereum (ETH) investors seeking quick profits and diversification. As Sui (SUI) spikes near the $1 mark and Mpeppe continues to gain momentum, Ethereum whales are eyeing these assets for their potential upside.
 
Sui (SUI) Price Surge: What’s Driving the Momentum? 
Sui (SUI) has been on a bullish tear recently, surging by over 5% to reach $0.935 on Sunday. The main driver behind this price spike is the launch of Sui’s native stablecoin project, AUSD. This new addition to the Sui (SUI) ecosystem is designed to enhance DeFi operations by providing a more reliable and decentralized asset for borrowing, lend…
articles.title: Top Gainers Sui and Mpeppe Attracts Major Ethereum Investors For Quick Profits

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market has been on a rollercoaster, with Ethereum (ETH) enduring a particularly turbulent ride. After reaching highs earlier this year, Ethereum has faced significant declines, prompting many investors to wonder if the worst is behind it. Recent analyses suggest that Ethereum might be gearing up for a trend reversal, aiming to break above $2,500. At the same time, ETH whales are increasingly eyeing new projects like Mpeppe (MPEPE), a decentralized casino platform, as an exciting opportunity to diversify their portfolios.
 
Ethereum’s Path to Recovery: A Bullish Turnaround? 
Ethereum (ETH) has seen its value fluctuate dramatically in recent months, raising questions about whether the digital asset has hit bottom. From soaring highs of up to $4,100 earlier in the year, Eth…
articles.title: Ethereum ETH Targets $2,500 As Mpeppe Attracts Big ETH Players To Casino

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
As the crypto market heads into the final quarter of 2024, investors are eyeing specific tokens with the potential for significant returns. Helium (HNT), Render (RNDR), and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are three cryptocurrencies experts believe have strong potential in the coming months. Here’s why these tokens deserve a spot in your portfolio.
 
Mpeppe (MPEPE): Revolutionizing Crypto and Sports Fandom 
Mpeppe (MPEPE) is more than just another meme cryptocurrency. Inspired by the viral success of Pepecoin and the charisma of soccer star Mbappé, Mpeppe (MPEPE) aims to unite sports enthusiasts and crypto investors under a shared banner. But what sets it apart is its ambitious venture into the world of gaming and sports betting ecosystems. 
 
Bringing Blockchain to Sports Enthusiasts 
Mpeppe (MPEPE) is mak…
articles.title: HNT, RNDR & Mpeppe (MPEPE): Top Analyst Covers 3 Cryptocurrencies You Must Hold In September

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrency, few coins have captured the attention of both analysts and investors like Sui (SUI) and the up-and-coming Mpeppe (MPEPE). With Sui (SUI) recently experiencing a 20% price surge and establishing itself as a formidable contender in the altcoin space, the entrance of Mpeppe (MPEPE), a mobile gaming-focused cryptocurrency priced at just $0.0021, is shaking things up. The question on everyone’s mind is: How will these two tokens compare, and can Mpeppe (MPEPE) rise to challenge SUI’s dominance?
 
SUI’s Meteoric 20% Pump 
SUI had an impressive week, with a 20% price pump, now trading at around $0.90. This rally comes after a challenging few months where Sui (SUI) struggled to maintain its momentum since reaching a local top of $1.05 in August. Analys…
articles.title: SUI vs Mpeppe: Top Gainer SUI Gains New Mobile Gaming Rival Priced $0.0021

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is in a state of flux, and Ethereum (ETH), the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap, is feeling the heat. Despite Ethereum’s monumental shift to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) and the introduction of Ethereum Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), it still lags behind Bitcoin. With ETH failing to break the $2,400 resistance level, Ethereum investors are now turning their attention to more promising ventures like Mpeppe (MPEPE), a new casino-focused Initial Coin Offering (ICO) that’s making waves.
 
Ethereum’s Struggles and Recent Performance 
In recent months, Ethereum’s price has been on a downward trend, leading to growing concerns within the investor community. From its 2021 highs, Ethereum has not been able to reclaim its former strength, hovering around $2,275 as of Sept…
articles.title: New Casino ICO Attracts Ethereum Investors As ETH Fails To Break $2400

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
The Federal Bureau of Investigation, or FBI, reports that cryptocurrency fraud losses jumped a whopping 45% to $5.6 billion in 2023, while complaints of scams involving digital assets have grown, with nearly 69,000 filed by victims across the country.
 
 
The investment scams turned out to be the most prevalent, accounting for 71% of the total losses reported to the FBI. These scams exploit the fear of missing out on cryptocurrency market gains by promising big profits. The report also shows that California, Florida, and Texas had the most complaints.
 
 
Victimizing Elderly People: FBI
 
The report presents a very serious cause of concern from the demographic point of view: Individuals above 60 years were the largest victims of the scam, by losses to the tune of almost $1.6 billion. Still…
articles.title: Crypto Fraud Explodes To $5.6 Billion – FBI Urges Caution In New Alert

articles.author: Sam White
articles.description:
For many years, crypto has been fended off accusations of being a solution in search of a problem. Another way of putting it is that product-market fit is an issue, or that crypto needs a killer app. It’s worth distinguishing here also between bitcoin and the rest of crypto. Bitcoin can claim a category of its own as a digital store of value, but when it comes to the rest of the blockchain environment, a wide variety of potential use cases are on the table but still unproven.
 Stablecoins have perhaps the clearest case for immediate utility, and then there’s the tokenization of real world assets, the use of NFTs in gaming, entertainment and as a medium for digital art, and there’s also DeFi as an alternative financial environment (although then there are still questions as to what specific…
articles.title: Polymarket Makes Crypto-Betting Mainstream: Is It a Killer App?

Here’s why these two projects are drawing such strong interest from major ETH holders.

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market has always been a hub of innovation, and three digital assets are currently standing out for their potential to bring significant returns: Ethereum (ETH), Starknet (STRK), and Mpeppe (MPEPE). Each of these projects represents a different sector of the blockchain industry, but they all share one thing in common, a vision to empower their holders and provide pathways for long-term success.
 
Ethereum (ETH): The Foundation of Decentralized Finance 
Ethereum (ETH) remains the backbone of the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. articles.author: Godspower Owie
articles.description:
With Bitcoin, the largest cryptocurrency asset by market cap, facing strong price hurdles, most investors are now turning to altcoins as the coins have recently demonstrated significant positive price performance, fueling optimism about an impending altseason in the short term.
 
Altcoins Take Center Stage In The Market
 
In a surprising shift within the cryptocurrency market, altcoins are gaining notable momentum and surpassing Bitcoin in the most recent market. Alphractal, an advanced platform for investment data analysis, pointed out the development in a recent post on the X (formerly Twitter) platform, capturing the attention of the crypto community.
 
 
This indicates that investors are currently looking to capitalize on alternative coins as BTC’s dominance has taken a hit. Although B…
articles.title: Altcoins Steal The Spotlight From Bitcoin In Recent Market Trend, Is The Altseason Here?

articles.author: PR Desk
articles.description:
Imagine a world where artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency, two of today’s most influential technologies, converge to transform digital finance. This vision is a reality with Hero.io, a leading platform that leverages AI to deliver cutting-edge insights into Web3 and decentralized finance (DeFi). Developed by Cambridge PhD researchers leveraging a novel AI model architecture and crypto-specific data streams, Hero.io is not just enhancing the crypto experience—it’s revolutionizing it.
 
 
 
 
The Technology Behind Hero AI Search
 
 
 
 
Hero.io’s AI search engine is powered by a proprietary framework called pre-emptive agentic flow, developed by Apta—a company founded by leading Cambridge PhD researchers. Apta’s framework enables conversational AI systems that excel at complex analysi…
articles.title: Meet the Best Tool for Deep Crypto Insights—Hero AI Search
